projects.title: Topology in Biology 2022
projects.description: Investigating topological structures and their applications in biological systems, focusing on protein folding patterns, DNA configurations, and cellular organization. This project explores how mathematical topology can provide insights into biological processes at multiple scales.

projects.title: Deep Learning for Artificial Cell
projects.description: Developing machine learning models to simulate cellular behavior and create artificial cellular systems using deep neural networks.

projects.title: Deep Learning in Medical Imaging
projects.description: Applying convolutional neural networks and advanced AI techniques for medical image analysis and diagnostic applications.

projects.title: Disentangling Knot Theory
projects.description: Mathematical investigation into knot theory applications and computational methods for analyzing complex topological structures. This project developed new algorithms for knot classification and practical applications.

projects.title: Dynamics of Entangled Polymers
projects.description: Studying the physical and mathematical properties of polymer entanglements and their dynamic behavior under various conditions. This project combined theoretical modeling with experimental validation.
